entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
